title: Reese Witherspoon is fall ready as she rocks an autumnal sweater when arriving at her office
text:
She's one of Hollywood's hardest working stars as a TV and movie actress, wife, mom, author, producer and CEO among other things.

And revealing she holds meetings while getting her hair and makeup done at her Hello Sunshine office, Reese was spotted early on Tuesday makeup free heading into the Santa Monica premises.

The 43-year-old dressed for fall in an oversized brown colored sweater.

Fall ready: Reese Witherspoon proved she was ready for the cooler season when she stepped out in a warm sweater on Tuesday morning while heading to her Hello Sunshine office in Santa Monica

Reese stunned in a red and white dress that fell to just below her knees.

She kept warm with a knitted jumper over the top and completed her look with white sneakers that had one shoelace undone.

The Morning Show actress accessorised with a pair of shades and carried a complimentary tan colored bag along with her.

Gorgeous: She kept warm with a knitted jumper over the top and completed her look with white sneakers that had one shoelace undone

Boss mom: The actress revealed on Monday in her Bazaar cover story that she gets her day started at her Santa Monica based office

Reese's short blonde hair was styled out naturally and she appeared to be makeup free.

The actress revealed on Monday in her Bazaar cover story that she gets her day started at her Santa Monica based office.

'In terms of work, Hello Sunshine is the majority of my world. It’s about storytelling for women, by women, and about getting more women behind the camera,' said the Wild star.

Busy busy: 'I do meetings in the morning while I’m getting my hair and makeup done. After that, the people who run my companies take over, and I focus on acting. Acting is still my core competency. It fills my tank'

'I do meetings in the morning while I’m getting my hair and makeup done. After that, the people who run my companies take over, and I focus on acting. Acting is still my core competency. It fills my tank.'

Reese shared some behind-the-scenes of her cover shoot for the magazine on Tuesday.

The mom-of-three rocked various bold ensembles as she posed for the camera and danced around as part of a fun day at work.
description: Reese Witherspoon proved she was ready for the cooler season when she stepped out in a warm sweater on Tuesday morning while heading to her Hello Sunshine office in Santa Monica.
